item.title: These stocks are the best insulated from Trump's tariffs, according to Barclays
item.description: These are the stocks that are the best insulated from tarrifs, per Barclays.

item.title: Low-beta growth stocks to ride out the Trump roller coaster, according to Trivariate Research
item.description: Buying low-beta stocks such as Mastercard and Boston Scientific could help improve portfolio performance, Trivariate Research said.

item.title: Bitcoin to stay under pressure in the near term, JPMorgan warns
item.description: JPMorgan doesn't expect a big move higher in crypto in the near future.

item.title: Tesla named 'bearish fresh pick' at Baird on poor sales, Musk's government involvement
item.description: Shares have slumped more than 33% in 2025, far underperforming the broader market. The S&P 500 is down roughly 2% so far this year.

item.title: Retail traders are really confused about what to do during the market sell-off this week
item.description: The latest global trade developments are contributing to retail traders' confusion.
